descriptionlist.description: 8 icon effects, 4 black and 4 white, intended to give a bit of depth to Stencil icons.

Not all of these look great with every version of Stencil, so experiment to find a setup you like. I particularly like them with the filled white and black variants of Stencil Main theme. I expect they also work quite well with other glyph themes
Let me know how you get on, on Discord, Twitter or email. The finished version will likely have many more variants!
